thread.section_title: Point A Hotel, London Paddington - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great place
thread.title_full: Great place - Review of Point A Hotel, London Paddington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Ariel A
title: Great place
text:
Really enjoyed my stay here in mid February, the staff were very friendly especially the reception lot Laura, Mateo and Marius. Will definitely be booking again!!
I particularly liked the rooms top notch regards to cleanliness as well, good house keeping which is very important when you're sleeping in beds you know are designed for different people to sleep in every night! Extremely comfortable.
